name: Iron Ghoul
description: Iron Ghouls are tough undead creatures, showcasing exceptional strength and resilience. They can attack with a bite, claws, or a glaive.
memorable: This creature can inflict debilitating diseases and paralysis, making it a terrifying foe in combat.
goals: The Iron Ghoul often acts as an enforcer of dark wills, relentlessly pursuing its foes.
relations: Iron Ghouls may be encountered with other ghouls and are resistant to effects that turn undead.
environment: Typically found in dark, foreboding places, often where other undead gather.
strengths: Significant durability and high strength, capable of multiple attacks and inflicting severe conditions on opponents.
weaknesses: Limited movement speed may put it at a disadvantage against ranged attackers.
attacks: The Iron Ghoul can bite for piercing damage, claw for slashing damage, or strike with a glaive. It can also use a heavy crossbow for ranged attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Its capacity to inflict diseases and paralysis on targets makes its attacks particularly dangerous.
senses: Iron Ghoul has darkvision up to 60 feet.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and resistant to being charmed or exhausted.
Does not require air or sleep, making it a tireless hunter.
Advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.
test_queries: undead creature with powerful paralysis attack
creature that inflicts diseases on humanoids
slow moving undead that uses glaive
monster immune to poison and charm effects
